reviewText: We like the Bananas DVDs.  They are family friendly and funny.
Paul is a creative, entertaining and funny musician/stand up comedian who can make you laugh without being crude. This is probably his best performance.
Paul Aldrich is funny.  Our family likes clean comedy the whole family can watch.  I like how he makes popular songs into comedy also.
I was quite pleased with this DVD.  It's hilarious and clean - yes, it can happen! Paul's use of music in his routine is incredibly funny and you can totally relate to him.
